amendment.description: Amendment sought to allow for actual damages in the liability section.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in House Report 110-450 to allow for actual damages in the liability section.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Watt amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 169 - 250 (Roll no. 1112).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Watt.
